com.microsoft.azure.cognitiveservices.inkrecognizer

Class InkRecognizerClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.cognitiveservices.inkrecognizer.InkRecognizerClientBuilder

  • public final class InkRecognizerClientBuilder
extends Object
    This class is used to create instances of the InkRecognizerClient and InkRecognizerAsyncClient classes
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Microsoft

      • credentials

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder credentials(InkRecognizerCredentials credentials)
        Used to set the application key for communicating with the service
        Parameters:
        credentials - The application key received after signing up for the service.
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

      • endpoint

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder endpoint(String endpoint)
        Used to set the endpoint url for communicating with the service
        Parameters:
        endpoint - The URL of the service endpoint to communicate with.
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

      • retryCount

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder retryCount(int retries)
        Parameters:
        retries - The number of times a retry should be attempted before reporting an error.
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

      • retryTimeout

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder retryTimeout(int timeout)
        Parameters:
        timeout - The amount of time to wait before attempting a retry.
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

      • applicationKind

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder applicationKind(ApplicationKind kind)
        Parameters:
        kind - The domain of the application (Writing or Drawing. The default is "Mixed").
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

      • language

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder language(String language)
        Parameters:
        language - The IETF BCP 47 language code (for ex. en-US, en-GB, hi-IN etc.)
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

      • unit

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder unit(InkPointUnit unit)
        Parameters:
        unit - The physical unit used for the ink points. The points are assumed to be in pixels if the values isn't specified.
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

      • unitMultiple

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder unitMultiple(float multiple)
        Parameters:
        multiple - The multiple to apply to the unit if it has been scaled. The points are assumed to be in pixels if the values isn't specified.
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

      • serviceVersion

        public InkRecognizerClientBuilder serviceVersion(ServiceVersion version)
        Parameters:
        version - The version of the service to use.
        Returns:
        The current InkRecognizerClientBuilder instance.

                                throws Exception
        Used to retrieve a new instance of the InkRecognizerClient class.
        Returns:
        An InkRecognizerClient instance.
        Throws:
        Exception - Exception thrown while trying to recognize ink
